review_text: The sound quality is amazing for the price, but the ear cups get sweaty after an hour. Battery life is decent.
Terrible connectivity! It keeps dropping the bluetooth signal every 10 minutes. Returning it immediately.
I love the health tracking features. It's very accurate. However, the strap feels cheap and broke after two weeks.
Beast of a machine. Runs Cyberpunk 2077 smoothly. Fans are a bit loud though.
It makes coffee. That's it. Nothing special, but it works.
